description.english: Win 5 matches without normal attack or skills

description.english: As Shark, knock out 3 players at once using skill

description.english: As Birdeye, fire a bullet and hit a player beyond 20m

description.tchinese: 用Birdeye技術擊昏距離20米以上的玩家

description.tchinese: 不使用基本攻擊，僅用技能贏得遊戲

displayName.english: What on earth have you done lately?

description.english: As Who, knock out 3 players at once using skill

description.tchinese: 用Who的單一技術讓對方3名以上暈倒

description.english: As Hina, use skill 10 times in a match

displayName.english: Why Won't You Say Hi back?

description.tchinese: 用Hina向比賽中的玩家問好3次

description.english: As Mine, win a matches without using skills

description.english: Win a match without ever taking over the bomb

description.tchinese: 一次也沒有拿到炸彈的遊戲勝利

description.english: As Shark, win 3 matches without using basic attack

description.english: As Kai, make other players to attack two of your clones at once

description.tchinese: 以KAI召喚給其他玩家的兩個分身都受到攻擊

displayName.japanese: ダイナミックエントリー！

description.english: Win a match by using skill once

description.tchinese: 在所有人都生存的情況下贏得遊戲
description.japanese: 全員が生存した状態でゲームに勝利する

description.english: Win a team match while no one in your team gets attacked

description.tchinese: 在不受攻擊的情況下贏得團隊模式

description.english: As Mine, change the shape in to one character and be the last two standing
description.koreana: 마임 한 번의 스킬로 변신한 캐릭터와 최후의 둘로 살아남기

description.tchinese: 通過Mime變身爲一次技能的角色和最後兩個生存下來

description.english: Enter the hidden map Backroom

description.english: Use taunt 10 times in a game

description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲中使用嘲諷 10 次

description.english: As Stinker, use skills more than 5 times in a game

description.schinese: 用Stinker在一场游戏中使用5次以上技能
description.tchinese: 用Stinker在一場遊戲中使用5次以上技能
description.japanese: 臭い犬で1つのゲームでスキルを5回以上使用する

description.english: As Stinker, make players step on traps more than 3 times
description.koreana: 똥개로 한 게임에서 다른 사람이 내 똥 3번 이상 밟기

description.tchinese: 用Stinker在一場遊戲中 其他玩家踩我3次以上的屎
description.japanese: 臭い犬で一つのゲームで他のプレイヤーが私のトンを3回以上踏む

description.english: As Stinker, make a player step on the trap within 3 seconds
description.spanish: La mierda generada por el Stinker se acelera en 3 segundos
description.schinese: 用Stinker生成的屎在3秒内被踩到
description.tchinese: 用Stinker生成的屎在3秒內被踩到

description.english: As Mondatta, identify more than 4 players in a game
description.koreana: 몬다타 스킬로 한 게임에서 플레이어 4명 이상 찾기

description.tchinese: 用Mondatta技術在一場遊戲中尋找4名以上玩家

description.english: As Zombie, knock out 3 players with a single skill
description.koreana: 좀비 단일 스킬로 플레이어 3명 이상 기절시키기
description.spanish: Desmayan a más de tres jugadores con una sola habilidad de Zombie
description.schinese: 用Zombie单一技术击倒3名以上玩家
description.tchinese: 用Zombie單一技術擊倒3名以上玩家
description.japanese: ゾンビ単一スキルでプレイヤー3人以上を気絶させる

description.koreana: 좀비 단일 스킬로 NPC 5명 이상 넘어뜨리기

description.schinese: Zombie用单一技术击倒5名以上NPC
description.tchinese: 用Zombie單一技術擊倒5名以上NPC

description.english: Reach end without a single mistake in Red light/Green light
description.koreana: 무궁화 모드에서 한 번의 실수 없이 보스 히나에게 도착하기
description.spanish: Llegada en Luz roja / Luz verde sin un solo error
description.schinese: 在一二三 木头人中一次也没有失误地到达
description.tchinese: 在一二三 木頭人中一次也沒有失誤地到達
description.japanese: だるまさんがころんだから一度のミスなく到着

description.english: Knock-out 3 players in Red light/Green light
description.spanish: Tres ataques a otros jugadores en Luz roja / Luz verde
description.schinese: 其他玩家在一二三 木头人中攻击3次
description.tchinese: 其他玩家在一二三 木頭人中攻擊3次
description.japanese: だるまさんがころんだで他のプレイヤーを3回攻撃

description.english: Win first place alone in Red light/Green light
description.spanish: Victoria en solitario como número uno en Luz roja / Luz verde
description.schinese: 在一二三 木头人中以单独第一的成绩获胜
description.tchinese: 在一二三 木頭人中以單獨第一的成績獲勝
description.japanese: だるまさんがころんだで単独1位で勝利

description.english: Win as a Cop
description.spanish: Gana como policía
description.japanese: 警察として勝利する

description.english: Win as a Robber
description.spanish: Gana como ladrón
description.japanese: 盗賊として勝利する

description.english: Win as a Spy
description.spanish: Gana como espía
description.japanese: スパイとして勝利する

displayName.japanese: テーザーガンは俺のだって！

description.english: Get stunned by a robber or spy’s skill while playing as a Cop
description.koreana: 경찰이 도둑 혹은 스파이가 사용한 스킬에 의해 스턴에 걸리기
description.spanish: Queda aturdido por la habilidad de un ladrón o espía mientras eres policía
description.schinese: 扮演警察时被盗贼或间谍的技能击晕
description.tchinese: 扮演警察時被盜賊或間諜的技能擊暈
description.japanese: 警察として泥棒またはスパイのスキルでスタン状態になる

displayName.english: Are We on the Same Team...?

description.english: Revive a Robber with a Spy
description.spanish: Revivir al espía como ladrón
description.japanese: 泥棒でスパイを復活させる

description.english: Use the Spy’s unique skill for the first time
description.spanish: Usa la habilidad única del espía (auto-revivir) por primera vez
description.schinese: 首次使用间谍的专属技能
description.tchinese: 首次使用間諜的專屬技能
description.japanese: スパイの固有スキルを初めて使用したとき

description.english: Revive Spy with a Robber
description.spanish: Revivir al ladrón como espía
description.japanese: スパイで泥棒を復活させる

description.english: Win 1st place in Deathmatch
description.spanish: Primer lugar en la 'Death Match'
description.tchinese: 在死亡對決中獲得第一名
description.japanese: デスマッチで1位を獲得する

description.english: Eliminate a marked Revenge target in Deathmatch
description.koreana: 데스매치 모드에서 리벤지로 설정된 대상 처치
description.spanish: Eliminar el blanco fijado como un revendedor en el 'Death Match'
description.tchinese: 在死亡對決中被設定爲復仇對象的處置
description.japanese: デスマッチでリベンジ対象を倒す

description.english: Achieve 3 consecutive kills without dying in Deathmatch
description.koreana: 데스매치 모드에서 죽지 않고 연속 3킬 달성
description.spanish: Alcanza tres asesinatos consecutivos sin morir en el 'Death Match'
description.tchinese: 在死亡對決中不死，實現連續3殺
description.japanese: デスマッチで死なずに3連続キルを達成する

displayName.japanese: 失礼ですが、燃えてますよ

description.english: Eliminate a Rampaging(On-Fire) player in Deathmatch
description.spanish: Elimina a los sujetos que están en fuga en el 'Death Match'
description.tchinese: 在死亡比賽中處理暴走的大賞
description.japanese: デスマッチで暴走状態のプレイヤーを倒す
